label: Book Â· 1964
name: Warren Commission Report
notes: The official report of the President's Commission on the Assassination of President John F. Kennedy, chaired by Chief Justice Earl Warren.
title: Report of the President's Commission on the Assassination of President John F. Kennedy
description: The official report containing the findings and conclusions of the commission formed to investigate the JFK assassination.
content_summary: Extensive investigation covering Oswald's background, the shooting incident, and the conclusion that he acted alone.

citations.chicago: Warren Commission. Report of the President's Commission on the Assassination of President John F. Kennedy. Washington, DC: GPO, 1964.
citations.apa: Warren Commission (1964). Report of the President's Commission on the Assassination of President John F. Kennedy.
citations.mla: Warren Commission. Report of the President's Commission on the Assassination of President John F. Kennedy. GPO, 1964.

label: Report Â· 1979
name: HSCA Final Report
notes: The final report of the House Select Committee on Assassinations, which re-investigated the assassination and concluded a 'probable conspiracy'.

label: Report Â· 1976
name: Church Committee Final Report
notes: Final report of the U.S. Senate Select Committee to Study Governmental Operations with Respect to Intelligence Activities. Investigated intelligence abuses by the CIA, FBI, IRS, and NSA.

label: Document Â· FBI Files
name: Ralph Leon Yates FBI File (Searchable PDF)
notes: Compiled FBI documentation regarding Ralph Leon Yates and the hitchhiker incident. Searchable PDF format containing interview reports, polygraph results, and investigation notes.

title: Final Report of the Select Committee on Assassinations
label: Report Â· 1979
description: Congressional investigation that re-examined the JFK assassination using modern forensics and concluded there was likely a conspiracy.
content_summary: 686-page report including photographic and acoustic evidence analysis. Concluded JFK was probably assassinated as a result of a conspiracy.

events.title: Report released
events.description: Final report published with conclusion of probable conspiracy

citations.chicago: United States House Select Committee on Assassinations. Final Report of the Select Committee on Assassinations. Washington, DC: GPO, 1979.
citations.apa: House Select Committee on Assassinations. (1979). Final Report of the Select Committee on Assassinations. U.S. Government Printing Office.
citations.mla: United States House Select Committee on Assassinations. Final Report of the Select Committee on Assassinations. GPO, 1979.
